name: @ton/convert-func-to-tolk
description: Convert FunC to Tolk with a single npx command

scripts.grammar:wasm: cd tree-sitter-func && tree-sitter generate && tree-sitter build-wasm --docker
scripts.build: rm -rf dist && tsc && cp node_modules/web-tree-sitter/tree-sitter.wasm dist/ && cp tree-sitter-func/tree-sitter-func.wasm dist/

author: TON Blockchain
